thread.title: JOHN WALLACE TAIT
thread.title_full: Goldcar evaluado por JOHN WALLACE TAIT

author: JOHN WALLACE TAIT
title: JOHN WALLACE TAIT
text: Pick up at Rome ciampino can be problematic. Last year we attended for a prepaid hire to be told that we would be subject to 72 euro diesel tax. We later complained to head office and the 72 euros was refunded and we were advised that it was a training issue which would be taken up with local staff. This will be our first time back to goldcar Rome ciampino since then. Trying to stay loyal to company but previous experience at location makes you think twice. Have used goldcar else where without issue.
